definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Fulgrim of the Emperor's Children was the closest to horus.
sentences.chinese: 帝皇之子的福爾格里姆是最親近何魯斯的人。

sentences.english: The closer they are to me, the mre I like them.
sentences.chinese: 愈是跟我親近的人，我愈是喜歡他們。

sentences.english: We need to have a happy medium between being too close and too distant to our friends.
sentences.chinese: 對待朋友應在過分親近與過分疏遠中，選擇中庸之道。

sentences.english: Rulers in Beijing are belatedly trying to befriend his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 北京的統治者們才亡羊補牢的費心思去親近他的敵人。

sentences.english: In the temple men drew near to God with music and pantomimes (out of this later the theatre developed).
sentences.chinese: 在聖殿的裏面，人類企圖親近上帝。

sentences.english: I too loved my closest disciple although we were not beloveds .
sentences.chinese: 我也愛著我最親近的門徒，儘管我們不曾是愛人。

sentences.english: The closer relationship between Japan and South Korea will also reinforce the Japan-US alliance.
sentences.chinese: 而更親近的日韓關係，也將夯實日美同盟。

sentences.english: Does skin-to-skin contact with their babies have benefits for the parents?
sentences.chinese: 和嬰兒親近對孩子父母也有好處麼？

sentences.english: Romantic love is when attraction and closeness are combined.
sentences.chinese: 彼此吸引與親近感結合，就產生了愛情。

sentences.english: The Hanna who could cry was closer to me than the Hanna who was only strong.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，會哭的漢娜比只會強硬的漢娜更親近。

sentences.english: You always gently flying in the mountains, is so close, cordial.
sentences.chinese: 你總是溫柔地飄舞在山間，是那麼親近，親切。

sentences.english: And Absalom her brother said unto her, Hath Amnon thy brother been with thee?
sentences.chinese: 她胞兄押沙龍問她說，莫非你哥哥暗嫩與你親近了嗎。

sentences.english: Most of these ancient towns are far away from the mega-cities and near to the nature and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 這些古鎮大部分遠離大城市，親近自然和農村。

sentences.english: They want to be close to thy skin and thy blood.
sentences.chinese: 他們想親近你的皮與血。

sentences.english: His two closest nude-curious friends are female, after all.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他的兩個親近的好奇裸體好友卻都是女性。

sentences.english: Hess was one of Hitler's closest aides.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯曾是希特勒最親近的助手之一。

definition: to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
willing (to do sth)/to take pleasure in
to be far from/to keep away from
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
